title: 107_hr1127
content: Health Care Tax Deduction Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow all individuals a deduction for amounts paid for qualifying health insurance and unreimbursed prescription drugs on behalf of the taxpayer, spouse, and dependents. Provides self-employed individuals not otherwise covered with 100 percent coverage for health insurance and unreimbursed prescription drug costs on behalf of the taxpayer, spouse, and dependents. Coordinates such deductions with existing individual and self-employed medical deduction provisions.
